code: import axios from"axios";var baseUrl='http://localhost:3001/book';var getBooks=function getBooks(){return axios.get(baseUrl);};var addBook=function addBook(newBook){return axios.post(baseUrl,newBook);};var updateBook=function updateBook(id,updatedBook){return axios.put("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id),updatedBook);};var deleteBook=function deleteBook(id){return axios.delete("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id));};var bookService={getBooks:getBooks,addBook:addBook,updateBook:updateBook,deleteBook:deleteBook};export default bookService;
